name: Scanvenging Cloning Puppies vs Zombie Donuts
name_original: Scanvenging Cloning Puppies vs Zombie Donuts
description:
I couldn't fix a bug in time : the second level is supposed to have stuff happening but it doesn't which unfortunately makes the other 5 levels unreachable... The first level works like intended though.

Also the game lies, it's not WASD but ZQSD, forgot to switch back to qwerty, oops
